title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still cannot access it.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is not responsive.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customerâ€™s billing address shows a different city. They updated it but it still displays the old one.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received the amount yet.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer tries to upload a new profile picture but gets 'Upload failed' error.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer wants to enable auto-renewal for their subscription but the toggle is disabled.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer placed an order but didn't receive a confirmation email even though payment succeeded.

title: Incorrect Language on Website
description: Customer noticed that the website shows incorrect language options for their region.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Customer tried to pay for an order but encountered a timeout error during the payment process.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Customer reports that the website is loading slowly and impacting their user experience.

title: Mobile App UI Bug
description: Customer found a UI bug in the mobile app where buttons overlap on the home screen.

title: Payment Processing Error
description: Customer's payment was declined due to an internal error in the processing system.
